title: Your Rival in Love Gets Prettier Every Day - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Acting   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Appearance Changes   Calm Protagonist   Celebrities   Character Growth   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cold Love Interests   Comedic Undertone   Confident Protagonist   Couple Growth   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Familial Love   Family   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Movies   Older Love Interests   Power Couple   Showbiz   Slow Romance   System Administrator   Transmigration
author: Gong Zi Yu Ge   公子于歌
description:
Big changes and even bigger twists. A drama within another drama. He’ll find his way to become prettier and sexier.

Shen Jintai gained access to a book-saving system that allowed him to transmigrate inside a book he was reading. By completing tasks assigned to him, he'll become more beautiful and sexier on his path to stardom. 

His first task: Stop being the male protagonist's suitor (stalker). Instead, be his rival in love and steal the person he was meant to be with.>
